title: Charles Chauvel: the action director
brief_description: Compilation film containing interviews with Elsa Chauvel, Sir Norman Rydge, Chips Rafferty, Betty Bryant, Marsden Hessall, and others who worked with Charles Chauvel. Long excerpts from his seven sound features, including “40,000 Horsemen” and “Jedda”. Includes B&W sequences.
